title: GOAL ACHIEVED part 2 ( i guess)
body: after getting all skins in the store i tried to get the remaining legacy skins from hextech crafting and i finally got them all. Interesting enough if you re-roll when you have all skins you get permanent skin shards that you can't redeem. now my life is complete but im quite sad its impossible to get some skins like past victorious skins pax skins and the collector's edition skins :(
